Valeera.name: Sinister Strike
Valeera.description: Dash forward, hitting all enemies in a line for 110 (+4% per level) damage. If Sinister Strike hits a Hero, Valeera stops dashing immediately and the cooldown is reduced to 1 second. Awards 1 Combo Point.

Valeera.name: Blade Flurry
Valeera.description: Deal 130 (+4% per level) damage in an area around Valeera. Awards 1 Combo Point per enemy Hero hit.

Valeera.name: Eviscerate
Valeera.description: Eviscerate an enemy, dealing damage per Combo Point.  1 Point: 85 (+4% per level) 2 Points: 170 (+4% per level) 3 Points: 255 (+4% per level).

Valeera.name: Smoke Bomb
Valeera.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

Valeera.name: Cloak of Shadows
Valeera.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

Valeera.name: Vanish
Valeera.description: Valeera vanishes from sight, becoming Stealthed and increasing her Movement Speed by 10%. For the first second, she is Unrevealable and can pass through other units.  Using Vanish grants Valeera an alternate set of Abilities that she can use while Stealthed.

ValeeraVanish.name: Ambush
ValeeraVanish.description: Ambush the target, instantly dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to the target.  Awards 1 Combo Point.

ValeeraVanish.name: Cheap Shot
ValeeraVanish.description: Deal 30 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and stun them for 1.25 seconds.  Awards 1 Combo Point.

ValeeraVanish.name: Garrote
ValeeraVanish.description: Garrote an enemy, dealing 20 (+4% per level) damage instantly, an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage over 7 seconds, and silencing them for 2.25 seconds.  Awards 1 Combo Point.

1.name: Vigor
1.description: Valeera regenerates an additional 2 Energy per second. Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

1.name: Subtlety
1.description: After remaining Vanished for at least 4 seconds, using Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote causes Valeera to regenerate an additional 10 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

1.name: Combat Readiness
1.description: Each Combo Point spent grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%. Stores up to 3 charges.

1.name: Crippling Poison
1.description: Activate to cause Valeera's next instance of Spell Damage to slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 5 seconds. Activating Crippling Poison does not break Vanish.

4.name: Relentless Strikes
4.description: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 10.

4.name: Hemorrhage
4.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 25% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

4.name: Initiative
4.description: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote award 1 Combo Points.

4.name: Wound Poison
4.description: Activate to cause Valeera's next instance of Spell Damage to also reduce healing received by the victim by 50% for 5 seconds. Activating Wound Poison does not break Vanish.

7.name: Mutilate
7.description: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 100% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

7.name: Fatal Finesse
7.description: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 3, up to 60. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

7.name: Slice and Dice
7.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points causes Valeera's next 3 Basic Attacks to have their Attack Speed increased by 150%. Lasts 3 seconds.

7.name: Assassinate
7.description: Ambush deals 100% additional damage if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.

10.name: Smoke Bomb
10.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

10.name: Cloak of Shadows
10.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

13.name: Elusiveness
13.description: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 10%.

13.name: Death From Above
13.description: Ambush now has 6 range and teleports Valeera behind the victim.

13.name: Blind
13.description: When Cheap Shot expires, the victim is blinded for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Strangle
13.description: Garrote reduces Ability Damage dealt by the victim by 25% for 7 seconds.

16.name: Seal Fate
16.description: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against silenced, rooted, or stunned enemy Heroes.

16.name: Rupture
16.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks increase the damage over time effect of Garrote by 5%, stacking up to 30%, and refresh the duration.

16.name: Expose Armor
16.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points causes them to lose 25 Armor for 2 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.

16.name: Thistle Tea
16.description: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy. Activating Thistle Tea does not break Vanish.

20.name: Adrenaline Rush
20.description: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 30 Energy per second.

20.name: Enveloping Shadows
20.description: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

20.name: Nightslayer
20.description: Reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 3 seconds.
